Uses of Package
net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators

Packages that use net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators
net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators Contains the core calculators implementing the <calculator> extension 
net.sourceforge.metrics.core   
net.sourceforge.metrics.propagators These are "automatic" calculators. 
 

Classes in net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators used by net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators
AbstractLinesOfCode
          Replace old LOC calculator which does not handle comments correctly.
Calculator
          Abstract base class for all metrics calculators.
InvalidSourceException
          thrown by a Calculator if it is not applicable for the given source
LackOfCohesion.Preferences
          Statically cache preference values, yet register for change events so they get updated when they change.
Norm.Preferences
          Statically cache preference values, yet register for change events so they get updated when they change.
